desc: One Blushing Bride designs handcrafted custom wedding veils, bridal capes, & hairpieces. Browse birdcage veils, short veils, fingertip veils, long veils, cathedral veils, white veils & handmade pearl accessories. A customized accessory for your wedding day as unique as you. Request free tulle and lace samples.

layout.text: For an Elegant & Memorable Walk Down the Aisle
